document.masterDocTitle: New species and new records of Manota Williston (Diptera, Mycetophilidae) from Thailand

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New species and new records of Manota Williston (Diptera, Mycetophilidae) from Thailand

bibRefCitation.author: Hippa
bibRefCitation.refString: Hippa, H. (2006) Diversity of Manota Williston (Diptera: Mycetophilidae) in a Malaysian rainforest: description of twenty-seven new sympatric species. Zootaxa, 1161, 1 - 49.
